section.name: Download page
section.p: Our automated build process generates a new release regularly. Our automated unit tests ensure a working application. Upon successfull packaging, we push a new version to our sourceforge account.
Please ensure you meet the minimal requirements to run the AQMS.
You may download the AQ Master Server from our site after accepting the license agreement.
section.form: I have read and accept the license agreement. You particularly understand that you download the free development server, which helps you get up and running.
